content: ARS (Acceptable Risk Safeguards) 5 Support! CMS SAF has updated relevant InSpec profiles (see “ARS 5” links on our Validate page) to allow teams to validate against CMS’ latest organizational-specific requirements!
Open-source tool support! The SAF CLI’s "convert" tool continues to support import/export/interchange of security data for a variety of open-source and vendor security tools.

Attestation support! Sometimes requirements can’t be tested automatically by security tools and hence require manual review, whereby someone interviews people and/or examines a system to confirm (i.e., attest as to) whether the control requirements have been satisfied. The SAF CLI’s “attest” tool lets you create and apply attestations for all your security data.

SAF CLI consolidates SAF automation goals into a convenient command-line tool, including commands to: generate InSpec security validation code, set and validate threshold checks within a pipeline, convert security tool test data to and from our standard Heimdall Data Format (HDF), and automate Heimdall setup and deployment.

The MITRE Security Automation Framework (SAF©) is excited to join the OASIS Open Standards Body in publicly announcing the launch of the OASIS Heimdall Data Format (OHDF) Technical Committee. Cisco, Intel, Sophos, and others have teamed with MITRE to advance the OHDF standard that supports cybersecurity product interoperability. "This standard, vendor-neutral data format will support cybersecurity product interoperability without having to create customized integrations" by "exchanging normalized data between cybersecurity tools."
The SAF CLI now supports AWS Security Hub and Splunk data integration!
CMS SAF now supports InSpec validation of Kubernetes (K8S, K3S, EKS)! Web, application, and database profiles have been confirmed/updated to work against containerized instances.
Heimdall can now auto-convert native security data file formats just through drag and drop! These are the same formats supported by the saf convert tool (formerly Heimdall-tools).
SAF now offers an AWS Lambda runner for InSpec – convenient scans without having to set up a runner!
Automate Manual Controls! SAF/InSpec can now address manual controls! See "Manual Controls" on the Validate page.
Heimdall Server supports role-based access, multi-target CAAT export, and more! Follow releases here.
Check back often to find the latest information on InSpec profiles, SAF CLI format converters, and Heimdall updates!
Heimdall-lite.cms.gov is live! CMS now has its own version of Heimdall-lite, an in-browser tool for analyzing security data!
A SAF CLI Lambda runner - convert, integrate, view data without having to install the SAF CLI!
SAF CLI will replace all the capabilities of the current InSpec Tools utility.
SAF CLI will help update existing InSpec profiles to current STIG and CIS standards.
